channel.itunes:subtitle: Latest news updates from HindustanTimes.com for ANALYSIS. For more updates hop on to HindustanTimes.com.

item.title: Cautious Obama frustrates others
item.description: President Barack Obama may have in his mind a very clear picture of what he wants to do with the ISIS and his critics see him stumbling from one misquote to another
item.itunes:subtitle: President Barack Obama may have in his mind a very clear picture of what he wants to do with the ISIS and his critics see him stumbling from one misquote to another
item.itunes:summary: President Barack Obama may have in his mind a very clear picture of what he wants to do with the ISIS and his critics see him stumbling from one misquote to another

item.title: Dont water down our river cleaning efforts
item.description: The NDAs plan to clean and rejuvenate the Ganga will be appreciated by all only if it extends the same courtesy to other rivers
item.itunes:subtitle: The NDAs plan to clean and rejuvenate the Ganga will be appreciated by all only if it extends the same courtesy to other rivers
item.itunes:summary: The NDAs plan to clean and rejuvenate the Ganga will be appreciated by all only if it extends the same courtesy to other rivers

item.title: Turn the light on innovation and investment
item.description: Yet again the summer of 2014 saw India reeling from the energy crises as temperatures hit a record high in six decades According to a 2014 World Bank study Indias energy sector problems keep 300 million without power
item.itunes:subtitle: Yet again the summer of 2014 saw India reeling from the energy crises as temperatures hit a record high in six decades According to a 2014 World Bank study Indias energy sector problems keep 300 million without power
item.itunes:summary: Yet again the summer of 2014 saw India reeling from the energy crises as temperatures hit a record high in six decades According to a 2014 World Bank study Indias energy sector problems keep 300 million without power

item.title: Modis election repression of Rohingyas Has Asia become a fertile ground for al Qaeda
item.description: As his star is declining in the Arab world Zawahiri may have sought to compensate in South Asia Muslim unease over Modis election the repression of the Rohingyas in Myanmar and any number of events in Pakistan may have seemed like fertile ground for recruitment and activity

item.title: Love Jihad Fish story or flirting with complex reality
item.description: As some have already pointed out the modus operandi is inefficient expensive and desperate But then again as Berg and others have demonstrated just because something is hazardous and downright stupid doesnt mean no one will ever attempt it Pathikrit Sen Gupta writes
item.itunes:subtitle: As some have already pointed out the modus operandi is inefficient expensive and desperate But then again as Berg and others have demonstrated just because something is hazardous and downright stupid doesnt mean no one will ever attempt it Pathikrit Sen G
item.itunes:summary: As some have already pointed out the modus operandi is inefficient expensive and desperate But then again as Berg and others have demonstrated just because something is hazardous and downright stupid doesnt mean no one will ever attempt it Pathikrit Sen Gupta writes

item.title: Obamas language on ISIS passive say critics
item.description: President Barack Obama may have in his mind a very clear picture of what he wants to do with the ISIS and his critics see him stumbling from one misquote to another

item.title: Anarchist Imran Khan may end up replicating role model Kejriwal
item.description: The maximalist approach Imran Khan refuses to abandon could cost him a lot Having styled himself after our own Arvind Kejriwal his denouement could well be the same writes Vinod Sharma
item.itunes:subtitle: The maximalist approach Imran Khan refuses to abandon could cost him a lot Having styled himself after our own Arvind Kejriwal his denouement could well be the same writes Vinod Sharma
item.itunes:summary: The maximalist approach Imran Khan refuses to abandon could cost him a lot Having styled himself after our own Arvind Kejriwal his denouement could well be the same writes Vinod Sharma

item.title: Think clean and then build toilets lets not flush the opportunity away
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modis decision to fasttrack the building of toilets is commendable The target of achieving total sanitation by 2022 has now been revised The government wants to reach the target in 2019 writes KumKum Dasgupta
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modis decision to fasttrack the building of toilets is commendable The target of achieving total sanitation by 2022 has now been revised The government wants to reach the target in 2019 writes KumKum Dasgupta
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modis decision to fasttrack the building of toilets is commendable The target of achieving total sanitation by 2022 has now been revised The government wants to reach the target in 2019 writes KumKum Dasgupta

item.title: Imran Khans descent from cricket captain to pulpit bully
item.description: There is nothing quite as sad as the sight of the once handsome cricketer over whom women swooned and men envied reduced to a pulpit bully all sound and fury signifying nothing at all writes Lalita Panicker
item.itunes:subtitle: There is nothing quite as sad as the sight of the once handsome cricketer over whom women swooned and men envied reduced to a pulpit bully all sound and fury signifying nothing at all writes Lalita Panicker
item.itunes:summary: There is nothing quite as sad as the sight of the once handsome cricketer over whom women swooned and men envied reduced to a pulpit bully all sound and fury signifying nothing at all writes Lalita Panicker

item.title: Public spaces have to be more womenfriendly
item.description: The 2013 National Crime Records Bureaunbspsays that there has been a 35 increase in rapes between 2012 and 2013 and that only 6 of these were rapes by strangers However public concern and discourse in India continues to primarily focus on stranger rapes

item.title: Balancing act Strategic ties with both Japan China possible
item.description: India does not have to choose sides It can work with Japan in areas of shared concern about China while working with China in areas that yield mutual benefits writes Kanwal Sibal
item.itunes:subtitle: India does not have to choose sides It can work with Japan in areas of shared concern about China while working with China in areas that yield mutual benefits writes Kanwal Sibal
item.itunes:summary: India does not have to choose sides It can work with Japan in areas of shared concern about China while working with China in areas that yield mutual benefits writes Kanwal Sibal

item.title: Balancing ties with both Japan China PMs biggest challenge
item.description: Narendra Modis praise of Japan as the country that has done more for modernising Indias infrastructure than any other is about as fervent as it gets in his foreign policy vision
item.itunes:subtitle: Narendra Modis praise of Japan as the country that has done more for modernising Indias infrastructure than any other is about as fervent as it gets in his foreign policy vision
item.itunes:summary: Narendra Modis praise of Japan as the country that has done more for modernising Indias infrastructure than any other is about as fervent as it gets in his foreign policy vision

item.title: Controversy sells but is Modi overdoing it
item.description: I dont know what the PM is going to say on September 5 But I think if he really wishes to do something for our rickety education system he should promise something substantial to the teachers on September 5 writes KumKum Dasgupta
item.itunes:subtitle: I dont know what the PM is going to say on September 5 But I think if he really wishes to do something for our rickety education system he should promise something substantial to the teachers on September 5 writes KumKum Dasgupta
item.itunes:summary: I dont know what the PM is going to say on September 5 But I think if he really wishes to do something for our rickety education system he should promise something substantial to the teachers on September 5 writes KumKum Dasgupta

item.title: The Congress is burying its head in the sand
item.description: From Sonia Gandhi to Rahul Gandhi down to the Lok Sabha candidate everyone has been responsible for Congress dismal performance As battlefield commanders the Gandhis ought to share the responsibility writes Kay Benedict
item.itunes:subtitle: From Sonia Gandhi to Rahul Gandhi down to the Lok Sabha candidate everyone has been responsible for Congress dismal performance As battlefield commanders the Gandhis ought to share the responsibility writes Kay Benedict
